metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21034 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: In multiple functions of SensorService.cpp, there is a possible access ofaccurate sensor data due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with User execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android-13Android ID: A-230358834

criterions.comment: android-platform-tools package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-tools package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
